def_en: Republican means relating to a republic. In republican systems of government, power is held by the people or the representatives that they elect.

def_cn: (美国)共和党的，支持共和党的
def_en: In the United States, if someone is Republican, they belong to or support the Republican Party.

def_cn: (支持北爱尔兰脱离英国加入爱尔兰共和国的)共和主义者，共和派
def_en: In Northern Ireland, if someone is Republican, they believe that Northern Ireland should not be ruled by Britain but should become part of the Republic of Ireland.
